column4: hello, i am really new to linux, and i was wondering if someone can help me sept by step on how to install ndiswrapper
i really don't see why people like linux if you have to do everything through the command line >.<
dam thoese docs! no help for me at all
but i havn't been able to fix thie problem for about a week
oh so its linksys cards that it has the problem with the most?
well this card is very common, it should have no problems just plug n play
i mean windows was plug n play...
have you configured ndiswrapper to work with it?
it is a pcmcia card right?
please eject the card and insert it again, then look at dmesg for me and put it in a pastebin
ok sure, whats dmesg and also i am on a seprate computer
